title: #HSLLInterface.v0_1_0.HSLLInterface

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

Oem.description: This is the manufacturer/provider specific extension moniker used to divide the Oem object into sections.
Oem.longDescription: The value of this string shall be of the format for the reserved word *Oem*.

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

Oem.longDescription: This object represents the Oem property.  All values for resources described by this schema shall comply to the requirements as described in the Redfish specification.

ConnectedSystems.description: This is a link to a collection of ComputerSystems connected to this interface.
ConnectedSystems.longDescription: This object shall only contain a reference to a collection of resources that comply to the ComputerSystem schema.

ConnectedDevices.description: This is a link to a collection of PCIeDevices connected to this interface.
ConnectedDevices.longDescription: This object shall only contain a reference to a collection of resources that comply to the PCIeDevice schema.

ConnectedSwitches.description: This is a link to a collection of PCIeSwitches connected to this interface.
ConnectedSwitches.longDescription: This object shall only contain a reference to a collection of resources that comply to the PCIeSwitch schema.

Links.description: The links object contains the links to other resources that are related to this resource.

SpeedGBps.description: The current operating speed of this HSLLInterface in GBps
SpeedGBps.longDescription: The value of this property shall contain current operating speed of this HSLLInterface in GBps

Width.description: operating width of the HSLLInterface specified in number of lanes
Width.longDescription: The value of this property shall contain the operating width of the HSLLInterface specified in number of lanes.

MaxSpeedGBps.description: The maximum speed of this HSLLInterface in GBps
MaxSpeedGBps.longDescription: The value of this property shall contain nominal speed of this HSLLInterface in GBps

MaxWidth.description: Maximum width of the HSLLInterface specified in number of lanes
MaxWidth.longDescription: The value of this property shall contain the Maximum width of the HSLLInterface specified in number of lanes.

Host.longDescription: This object shall only contain a reference that complies to the ComputerSystem schema.

Connections.description: This is a link to a collection of connections that use this interface.
Connections.longDescription: This object shall only contain a reference to a collection of resources that comply to the HSLLConnection schema.

HSLLInterface.description: This is the schema definition for the HSLLInterface resource.
HSLLInterface.longDescription: This is the schema definition for the HSLLInterface resource. It represents the properties of a HSLLInterface.
